Name: Diacrisis
About the game: A disturbing distress call from Excillar Supermax Security Penitentiary alerted Matthew Diacrisis about the outbreak of unrelenting zombie hordes, which eradicated all hope of redemption for the prisoners who now will do anything to escape this dilapidated correctional facility. A full arsenal of military weapons mixed with core elements of combat and exploration! Embark on an unique hand drawn fame-by-frame story of an eerie shocking truth! A complete 2D and 3D visual was performed to bring this title to the highest. Find all diary pages and classified files to put you into context! Survive relentless hordes of zombies in this isolated region. Crowd control the hordes of zombies with knife attacks. Unlock a new level after beat the game! 5 hours of single-player story mode.
